page.title: 13Amenities and Lifestyle
page.content: {LEISURE AND RECREATION FACILITIES} Sports facilities are limited but have been improved of late with a sports barn near Eddlewood. There is a private Bowling Club in Eddlewood with a club attached and a number of foot- ball teams exist, usually for unorgan- ised games. There is a Community Cen- tre just outside our area. Most of the housing areas lack public houses, which tend to be concentrated on Strathaven Road - but one new pub exi- sts and one old one in Meikle Earnock. {RELIGION} The area has a large Catholic popu- lation, with two Churches at the edge of the survey. Only one Church of Scotland parish is in the area, with another just outside. The existence of two Catholic primary schools confirm the extent of the Catholic population.
